com.radiusnetworks.ibeacon

Class SimulatedScanData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.radiusnetworks.ibeacon.SimulatedScanData

  • public class SimulatedScanData
extends java.lang.Object
    Class : SimulatedScanData What: You may simulate detection of iBeacons by creating a class like this in your project. Each iBeacon in the list will be detected by the system exactly once in each scan cycle. This is especially useful for when you are testing in an Emulator or on a device without BluetoothLE capability. Used : Notes: Date/Vers : 2014 / 0.1.0 Project Leader/Team : N.L.Fantana / Krunoslav Grcevic 2014 (c) ABB DECRC
